title: “Salt Bae” prying the World Cup trophy from Cristian Romero and his son.

author: cemacz
text: Who allowed this idiot into the pitch

author: fastesthandsonhere
text: Agreed how tf did he end up on there. Security should’ve hit him with a taser.

author: kyrant
text: Should've sprinkled salt in his eyes.

author: trikristmas
text: I really want to see him get knocked out and someone to sprinkle salt into his eyes

author: sp4rkk
text: With enough money anything is possible in Qatar, even if you are a cunt.

author: Pickle4UrThoughts
text:
The people with insane money involved in running Qatar who frequent his restaurant, I’m sure.  He’s an absolute pompous ass, but he does have insane connections.

I would say hopefully he embarrassed whoever was responsible for getting him credentials & they would take him down a peg, but as he’s not a women, probably not.
